text: Belchen is the name of the following mountains in the vicinity of the Franco- German-Swiss tripoint: * Black Forest Belchen or Baden Belchen (Schwarzwälder Belchen or Badischer Belchen, 1,414 m), in the Southern Black Forest, Germany * Swiss Belchen (Belchenflue, Schweizer Belchen, Bölchen or Bölchenfluh, 1,099 m), in the Swiss Jura * Alsatian Belchen (Elsässer Belchen, Welscher Belchen or Ballon d'Alsace, 1,247 m), in the Vosges, France * Great Belchen (Großer Belchen, Sulzer, Gebweiler Belchen or Grand Ballon, 1,424 m), highest mountain in the Vosges, France * Little Belchen (Kleiner Belchen, Kahler Wasen or Petit Ballon, 1,267 m), also in the Vosges ;Other meanings * Belchen (nature reserve), nature reserve in the counties of Lörrach and Breisgau- Hochschwarzwald in Baden-Württemberg, Germany See also: * Belchen System * Belchen Tunnel under the Belchenflue
title: Belchen
